name: Off Road Heavy Driving - Army Transport Cargo Game
name_original: Off Road Heavy Driving - Army Transport Cargo Game
description:
Welcome to Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D driving is a diffecuit tasks especially transporting cargo, Be an extreme offroad hill driver to deliver cargo to army camps. Driver mega army off road transport trucks on rugged terrains and enjoy the thrill of hill climb off road drive load the army jeeps, trucks, tanks on trailer and drive the army truck trailer be carefully because army truck trailer is very heavy and big.
Track will be difficult or long after each level of game. This test of your skills of acceleration, steering and brakes if you complete this game then you will be a good off road army truck driver. Now complete missions Survive through different mission and complete the tasks to unlock the next missions. Your mission is to transport heavy army cargo, vehicles and warheads in war field extreme Army truck hill driving.


Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D Features

- Real Experience Off Road Army Truck Driving
- Smooth Steering & Brake
-Amazing 3D Graphics & Off Road Environment
- Challenging off road Army cargo transport levels.
- Two control options: buttons and steering option.
- Real off-road truck driving life experience.
- High quality graphics

Your Feedback, Ratings & Comments are valuable for us
